alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lafayette; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 9:49PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lafayette, northeastern Yalobusha and northwestern Calhoun Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 948 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Springdale, or near Water Valley, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oxford, Water Valley, Holly Springs National Forest, Springdale, Tula, Burgess, Banner, Denmark, Paris, Taylor, Altus and Yocona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi.
